curvature[source]

curvature(P, diffusion_powers=8, aperture=20, smoothing=1, avg_transition_probabilities=True, precomputed_powered_P=None)

Same as the curvature function, but uses pytorch as backend instead of numpy. Works on both tensors and COO sparse tensors.
